title: Tiger King Juror: " Jury cried when Joe Exotic convicted."
itunes:title: Tiger King Juror: " Jury cried when Joe Exotic convicted."
description:
The Netflix docu-series 'Tiger King' has many talking about the life of Joe Exotic and whether or not he deserves to be in jail, despite having hired a hit man to kill Carole Baskin. But what did the jury really think? Listen to Kristen as she tells Nancy Grace what went on inside the courtroom.


Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
